summary.name: Gloria Galasso
summary.description: With a solid academic foundation in international linguistics and European studies from UniversitÃ  Cattolica del Sacro Cuore, followed by a cutting-edge Master's in Computational Linguistics from the University of Stuttgart, I bring a unique blend of cultural insight and technical expertise to language technology projects. My role as Project Coordinator at Gopa.com allows me to bridge the gap between linguistic theory and practical NLP applications, coordinating diverse teams across borders and disciplines. I thrive in multilingual environments, leveraging my background to facilitate communication, streamline workflows, and ensure the successful delivery of innovative AI-driven solutions in the European context.
